name: StrigidaeSmartLife
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control all your Strigidae devices! Alexa can show you the live feed from a camera on a supported device!*

1)Download the Strigidae app from Apple App Store or Google Play Store (skip to step 4 if you have already set up your cameras).

2)Log in to your Strigidae account or create a new one.

3)Click the Plus sign and follow the on-screen instructions to add your Strigidae devices.

4)Download and open the Amazon Alexa app and log in to your Amazon account.

5)Tap the top left for the menu and select “Skills & Games”.

6)Search for “Strigidae Smart Life”, click on it, and click Enable To Use.

7)Link your Strigidae account with Strigidae username and password.

And that’s it! Just speak to Alexa to control your Strigidae devices! You do not need to invoke or prompt with a different word, just say “Alexa!”

*For all other cameras you can view live videos on your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV (all generations), Fire TV Stick (2nd generation), and Fire Tablets (7th generation and later).
